tools.httpserver
Class TextTools

java.lang.Object
  tools.httpserver.TextTools

public class TextTools
extends java.lang.Object

Tools to manipulate various encoding.
Supports hexa<=>ascii encoding/decoding and utf8<=>ascii decoding
